title: FO thanks diplomatic corp over good wishes for ailing FM Qureshi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 03 (APP):Foreign Office Spokesperson Aisha Farooqui Friday thanked the Dean and entire Diplomatic Corp in Islamabad for extending best wishes for early recovery and good health of COVID-19 positive Foreign Minister Shah Mahmood Qureshi.
“(Foreign Minister) remains strong & energetic during this period & continues to discharge his responsibilities from home,” the spokesperson added.
Earlier in the evening, the foreign minister had announced on Twitter of being tested positive for COVID-19 after he had felt a slight fever.
